Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.actionhandler

Class ActionHandlerGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.ActionHandler
      • it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.actionhandler.ActionHandlerGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Ifxml<javafx.scene.layout.Pane>, MatchSnapshotProvider, RemoteActionsProvider, ViewElement
    public class ActionHandlerGUI
extends ActionHandler
implements Ifxml<javafx.scene.layout.Pane>, MatchSnapshotProvider, RemoteActionsProvider
    This class extends ActionHandler and is dedicated to managing actions on clients side, in case the user chose a GUI based display.

        private java.util.List<ShopController> setupStores()
        calls setupShop method for every shop (3 in total)
        Returns:
        The list of controllers relative to the three newly created shop icons

      • setupShop

        private void setupShop​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView store,
                       ShopController shopController)
        Displays an icon corresponding to the store gotten has a parameter. The icon is clickable and displays the weapons it currently contains when the user clicks on it.
        Parameters:
        store - Icon representing one of the 3 stores.
        shopController - Controller relative to the shop icon the user is approaching

      • onNewMessage

        public void onNewMessage​(java.lang.String message)
        Description copied from interface: ViewElement
        Provides a protocol to follow when a generic message is sent from the server to the client. The message is going to be printed to the user regardless if the chosen interface is GUI or CLI.
        Specified by:
        onNewMessage in interface ViewElement
        Parameters:
        message - Message printed to the user

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
